label: 明法
本: Sugawara no Michizane and the Early Heian Court . University of Hawai'i Press . 1994
説明文: One of the four civil service examinations.  Others were shūsai (flourishing talent"), myōgyō (classics), and shinshi ("presented scholar"--the Chinese chin-shih).  On the law examinations, candidates were asked meanings of ten passages from Japanese law codes (p. 75). [秀才、明経、進士] "
